Package org.apache.flex.swf.io

This package contains classes and interfaces for reading and writing SWF files.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISWFReader
    Read a SWF file and construct in-memory model.
    ISWFWriter
    Serialize an ISWF object to bytes.
    ISWFWriterFactory
    A factory interface for creating ISWFWriter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InputBitStream
    Implementation of InputBitStream.
    LZMACompressor  
    LZMACompressor.StreamAdapter
    This simple wrapper make an IOutputBitStream look like in InputSteam.
    LZMAInputStream
    Takes an input stream of LZMA compressed bytes, provides a stream on uncompressed data.
    OutputBitStream
    The output stream that can write SWF primitive data types.
    SizeReport
    Helper class generally used by SWFWriterAndSizeReporter to collect size related metrics for a given SWF and to generate an optional XML report of the summarized data.
    SizeReportWritingSWFWriter
    A class that writes a SWF and a size report.
    SWFDump
    Dump a SWF model to XML.
    SWFReader
    Implementation of ISWFReader.
    SWFReader.TagHeader
    Wrapper class for "type" and "length" field in a SWF tag header.
    SWFWriter
    The implementation of SWF tag, type encoding logic.

Package org.apache.flex.swf.io Description

This package contains classes and interfaces for reading and writing SWF files.

Use SWFReader to read a SWF file and SWFWriter to write one.
